Subalit Fourier sa lalong madaling panahon ang kalooban sa pagtanggap ng mga order, marahil mula sa Carnot, na ang ay upang tanggalin ang lahat ng administrator sa royalista sympathies.
output: Napoleon was angry with Fourier who he had hoped would welcome his return. Fourier was able to talk his way into favour with both sides and Napoleon made him Prefect of the Rhône. instruction: Given a sentence in Tagalog language, translate the sentence to English language keeping the meaning of the original sentence intact.

output: The proclamation of a public miracle caused very intense speculation throughout Portugal.
